name: THINGS-fMRI1
name_description: Event-related functional MRI data in 3 subjects for 8,640 images (720 categories, 12 images per category), collected over the course of 12 sessions. Includes extensive anatomical scans, population receptive field mapping, and functional localizers.

name: THINGS-MEG1
name_description: Magnetoencephalography (MEG) data in 4 subjects for 22,248 images (1,854 categories, 12 images per category), collected over the course of 12 sessions.
